content.raw:
I've modified this PR to add testing jobs using stable repository \(named `install_pkg_stable)` while moving the default to use `ros-shadow-fixed.`

* New stable job tested [here](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ros_gazebo_pkgs-install_stable_pkg_stable_ros_kinetic-xenial-amd64/1/console) [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ros_gazebo_pkgs-install_stable_pkg_stable_ros_kinetic-xenial-amd64&build=1)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ros_gazebo_pkgs-install_stable_pkg_stable_ros_kinetic-xenial-amd64/1/)
* Build failing [previously](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ros_gazebo9_pkgs-ci-pr_any_lunar-xenial-amd64/19/), now is [unstable](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ros_gazebo9_pkgs-ci-pr_any_lunar-xenial-amd64/21/) [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ros_gazebo9_pkgs-ci-pr_any_lunar-xenial-amd64&build=21)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ros_gazebo9_pkgs-ci-pr_any_lunar-xenial-amd64/21/)
content.html:
I've modified this PR to add testing jobs using stable repository (named install_pkg_stable) while moving the default to use ros-shadow-fixed.

  • New stable job tested here
  • Build failing previously, now is unstable
